Description: Only 4 Blocks to UPS! A gorgeous 4 bedroom/1 bath, 2 story craftsman bungalow. The bathroom is brand new and very luxurious. It has designer tile on the floor and wall, granite countertop and all new fixtures, - it's perfect! The home has coved ceilings, large rooms, hardwoods throughout. The living room has an old-world stone fireplace flanked by built-in bookcases and windows. Beautifully decorated in designer colors this house also has French doors flanked by built-in bookcases. The kitchen has all appliances including microwave and d/w. Deck, private, fenced backyard. The basement has laundry with washer and dryer and tons of storage! Efficient forced air gas furnace. Lovely yard in a quiet neighborhood. Well maintained and very clean. May have 5th person for $100 more per month. Email for additional pictures. Available for viewing by appointment only. We take pride in our rentals and respond quickly to requests and concerns! NS/NP Rents Quickly. This house is very attractive!
